name: My Dad Left Me: VR Game
name_original: My Dad Left Me: VR Game
description:
Welcome to My Dad Left Me: VR Game, a sequel to Scuffy Game that no one on Earth asked for.



Your dad has left you, and it's up to you to to find him with all the milk he has left you to find. Will you be the first to finally find your dad from his trip for the milk, or will you just stay home and play Scuffy Game instead?

Features:

  • 10 Levels
  • VR Only
  • Enemies
  • UE4 Guns (yeah idk)
  • Milk
  • Chocolate Milk?
  • Bugs... I think
  • Teleportation movement
  • Cookies
  • Slo-mo ability
